1521910.name: PolyShot
1521910.description:
Ready for a low-poly shooting adventure? Polyshot is a low-poly first person shooter game with online multiplayer and marches with bots. Beat others to climb your rank. Would it be fun without friends though? Play with your friends in different game modes like team death match, Gun game, free for all, capture the flag and see who'll stand out on top. you have full customization of your guns and loadouts want a 16x scope on a pistol go for it want iron sight on a sniper sure extended mag on sniper go wild with a bunch of different guns and more getting added every update as the game gets more and more jam-packed

NOTE

Please note that the game is still in beta and there will be few quirks and bugs in the game a few known ones are
  • Bots animation are a little scuffed
  • servers sometimes dont show up
1521910.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
